name: UKCoreConditionRelationship
title: UK Core Condition Relationship
description: A set of codes that define the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition or problem.

concept.definition: This condition is merged/combined with the target condition to form a single logical condition.
This target condition is a component problem of this condition.
This condition has evolved from the target condition.
The problem referenced is the parent of the problem/item in the resource.
The problem referenced is the child of the problem/item in the resource.
The problem referenced is a sibling of the problem/item in the resource.
